summary: Generates a "tableofcontents"-navigation-menu for the gui menubar.
name: latexmenu
description:
This plugin adds a function GenerateLatexMenu() which parses a latexfile
for \chapter's, \section's, etc. and generates a "Navigation"-menu in the gui-menubar
where you can jump quickly into the different sections.
install_details:
- copy latexmenu.vim into your .vim/plugin directory
- open a .tex-File
- :call GenerateLatexMenu()
